title: Process a Contract Addendum
description: The buyer and seller have agreed to change the closing date. The TC needs to process the addendum.

tasks.description: Receive the fully signed addendum changing the closing date.
Upload the addendum to the transaction management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The signed document is saved in the official transaction file.

tasks.description: Update the closing date in the system's transaction summary and notify all parties (lender, title).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system's key date is changed, and a notification email is sent to the lender and title company.
